title: I just got a 30 minute ban for not locking in my ban even thought it wasn't my turn to ban?
body:
So i was in champ select with my duo queue friend and i was 4th pick and 3rd person to ban but when it was the enemies time pick their first ban and when they didnt ban I was kicked out of the game and given a 30 minute ban. 

Also the banning seems a bit off in customs because today I was playing in some matches in the AVCON league tournament and every time we tried to ban the 3rd time instead of banning it would just ignore the ban and sometimes it would make the person pick the champ 

Thanks for reading (:
